name: Digital Marketing Insights
description: A comprehensive blog about digital marketing strategies, trends, and best practices for businesses looking to grow their online presence and engagement, with actionable insights and data-driven recommendations.
theme_prompt: Create educational and strategic content focused on modern digital marketing approaches. Emphasize data-driven insights, practical implementation steps, and measurable results. Include current industry trends, case studies of successful campaigns, and expert opinions. Each article should provide clear, actionable takeaways that readers can immediately apply to their marketing efforts.

style_guide.heading_style: Sentence case with key terms capitalized
style_guide.bullet_points: Encouraged for lists and key takeaways
style_guide.language_complexity: Moderate - explain industry jargon when used
style_guide.visual_elements: Include relevant data visualizations, process diagrams, and example screenshots
style_guide.citations: Reference current marketing studies, statistics, and expert sources
